title: Two Pastors Discuss Psychedelics & Joe Rogan
description:
To listen to the full conversation subscribe on Apple Podcasts at:
https://podcasts.apple.com/us/podcast/ep-61-adam-russell-transcendent-experiences-psychedelics/id1401730159?i=1000475040973

To listen on Android/PC:
https://www.podbean.com/eu/pb-ieq4a-dcee40

Support Deep Talks on Patreon at:
https://www.patreon.com/deeptalkstheologypodcast
